name: Continue/Stop/Rise
summary:
In this game, a fan sequel to Off, the switch was already flipped and the mission is finished. But instead of darkness, there is light.

You play yet again as The Batter, in a search for his Add-Ons, while on an unfamiliar, yet familiar world. Suddenly a mysterious hooded woman appears while you sleep, and then you meet two alternates after you awake: the angry, vulgar
yet brutally honest Ghost Batter and the polite, cheerful and constantly-looking-for-trouble Bad Batter.
